revision.text:
This is a 32-map ZDoom megawad, by cyber-menace.
Drawing heavy influence from [[007: Licence to Spell DooM]], the wad has a mission based setup with heavy scripting and use of ZDoom features. There are quite a few new monsters (including a family of cyberdemons - see the title), plus a storyline that is partially voice-acted. Some of the maps have already been released as singles (heh) and a 4-map demo was recently released as well.
To download the 4-map demo, click [http://www.doomworld.com/idgames/index.php?id=12457 here]. To visit the DTCA site, click [http://dtca.2webh.com/ here].
UPDATE: The project site is no longer available, so I'm considering the project abandoned as well.
[[category:Abandoned ZDoom Projects]]
